SELECT T2.IDX AS IDX, NVL(T1.CNT, 0) AS CNT, T2.SENDER AS SENDER, T2.CHAT_CON AS CHAT_CON FROM (SELECT ROOM_IDX, COUNT(*) CNT FROM CHAT_LOG WHERE STATUS = 1 AND SENDER != #{username} GROUP BY ROOM_IDX) T1 RIGHT OUTER JOIN (SELECT * FROM (SELECT R.IDX AS IDX, L.SENDER AS SENDER, L.CHAT_CON AS CHAT_CON , TO_CHAR(L.CHAT_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH:MI:SS') AS CHAT_DATE , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY R.IDX ORDER BY CHAT_DATE DESC) RNUM FROM CHAT_ROOM R INNER JOIN CHAT_LOG L ON R.IDX = L.ROOM_IDX WHERE END_DATE IS NULL) WHERE RNUM = 1) T2 ON T1.ROOM_IDX = T2.IDX
